title: ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for ECG Technician Post
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs...
